ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MAVEN SWEA Survey Rate 3D Electron Distributions Data Collection

RevisionEvent.Note: Draft metadata created by LFB (ADAPT code), final editing by AK

ResourceHeader.Description: MAVEN Solar Wind Electron Analyzer (SWEA) electron energy/angle (3D) distributions in units of differential energy flux (eV/cm^2 sec ster eV) at the MAVEN survey telemetry rate. Description of the SWEA instrument can be found on the SWEA home page https://lasp.colorado.edu/maven/science/instrument-package/swea/ and in the SWEA instrument publication https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-015-0232-1.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator David L. Mitchell for use of these data.

InformationURL.Name: MAVEN Data Archive at PDS PPI Node

AccessURL.Name: PDS PPI
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format at the Planetary Data System, Planetary Plasma Interactions node

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator D. Larson

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via ftps from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via https from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and Plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator David L. Mitchell. Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator David L. Mitchell. Please also acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

Parameter.Name: Time, center of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Description: Time, center of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, center of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, center of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, center of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, center of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Energy binning factor
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Energy binning factor: 1 = 64 energies, 2 = 32 energies, 4 = 16 energies

Parameter.Name: Raw Instrument Counts
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Calibrated differential energy flux at 1st Deflection Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Movie [flux vs. energy and azimuth angle] at 1st Deflection Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: diff_en_fluxes.

Parameter.Name: Spectrogram at selected Azimuth Angle bins 1,4,7,10,13,16 at 1st Deflection Index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: diff_en_fluxes.

Parameter.Name: Calibrated Differential Energy Flux [vary with time, energy, deflection index and azimuth angle] at 2nd Deflection Index
